requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX Yosemite
  • Processor: Dual Core Mac Mini or similar
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512mb On-board Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB Dedicated Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Option included within game to run on Intel based graphics hardware commonly found in Mac Mini. Xbox controller support using Tattie Bolge driver included but remains untested at this stage!
